LanguageData.Setting_WildMetroidEntry_Description: Allow Metroids to spawn within a newly generated map.
LanguageData.Setting_MetroidBerserking_Description: Determine if Metroids have a chance to berserk upon reaching a certain food value.
LanguageData.Setting_MetroidBerserkUntame_Description: Determine if Metroids that berserk will have a chance of untaming, and permanently returning to the wild.
LanguageData.Setting_AllowQueenCapture_Title: Allow Queen Metroids to be controlled
LanguageData.Setting_AllowQueenCapture_Description: A failsafe is coded to prevent Queens from falling into player control. This overrides that, allowing Queens to be forcibly tamed.
LanguageData.Setting_AllowQueenCapture_Warning: Warning: Queens are currently not intended for player use. This only exists for player freedom; fixing issues relating to tamed queens are a low priority.
